ValidationRule.description: Case Status cannot be changed from closed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'EDRD', $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator', OR( $Permission.EDRD_MOH_STAFF = TRUE, $Permission.EDRD_PHSA_PSP_Staff = TRUE ),
OR( ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Status ), "Cancelled"), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Status ), "Funding Approved"), ISPICKVAL( PRIORVALUE( Status ), "Funding Denied") ),
OR( ISPICKVAL( Status, "Received - Awaiting Verification"), ISPICKVAL( Status, "SC Review"), ISPICKVAL( Status, "AC Review"), ISPICKVAL( Status, "MOH Review") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have access to make these changes, please contact Ministry of Health staff
